Product Title: All-New Toshiba 50LF621U21 50-inch Smart 4K UHD with Dolby Vision - Fire TV Edition, Released 2020
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2020
Review Title: Great quality and color. Fast, easy to use.
Review Description: Love , love, love this tv. It is fast,  clear picture, easy remote, easy access to hulu, amazon, netflix with a press of a button. No searching through. Would recommend for any and everyone! It also works for gaming. (As pictured)

Product Title: All-New Toshiba 50LF621U21 50-inch Smart 4K UHD with Dolby Vision - Fire TV Edition, Released 2020
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2020
Review Title: If you are hearing impaired this is not the TV for you
Review Description: I am hearing impaired and require a secondary sound source, headphones. The problem with this tv is that you can have headphones or system speaker but not both. So if I want to watch the tv nobody else can cause speakers are disabled when you plug in the headset. Looked around for a solution but evidently there is not one.

Product Title: All-New Toshiba 50LF621U21 50-inch Smart 4K UHD with Dolby Vision - Fire TV Edition, Released 2020
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2020
Review Description: The package was packed poorly..I almost threw away the remote because it was jammed in between some styorofoam. My TV arrived two days sooner than the estimated delivery date. It’s a very nice tv. Sound quality is great, you probably don’t need a sound bar it’s very loud even at 25%. I tested the tv with call of duty, cartoons and an HD nature show and they all look amazing. If you’re someone who is picky you might notice it’s allegedly 720p, but it’s a solid TV for me. I guess we’ll see what happens in a year..hopefully it holds up unlike some of these other reviews!

Product Title: All-New Toshiba 50LF621U21 50-inch Smart 4K UHD with Dolby Vision - Fire TV Edition, Released 2020
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2020
Review Title: Great Value for the money. Clear solid picture. Colors are beautiful
Review Description: I was pleasantly surprised what great clear picture this TV gives out . When we first installed it it was not very clear . Come to find out maybe it was the cable connection not giving a good signal. But now we have a new cable connection and its a sharp clear view. Amazing value for the money.  So far so good a week into it. Im happy with my purchase....

Product Title: All-New Toshiba 50LF621U21 50-inch Smart 4K UHD with Dolby Vision - Fire TV Edition, Released 2020
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2020
Review Description: This is an excellent tv.  Lots of apps (Prime, Netflix, Pandora, Disney+, YouTube and many more) and the Dolby sound and video are better than expected.  We typically attach an external sound system such as a speaker bar, but that will not be needed with this tv.  I am very surprised with the sound quality.  I specifically chose a tv with Dolby video for the quality of the picture - and it is crisp and bright.  It was packaged very well and we had it up and running in a few minutes.  We are very pleased with this tv!

Product Title: All-New Toshiba 50LF621U21 50-inch Smart 4K UHD with Dolby Vision - Fire TV Edition, Released 2020
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2020
Review Description: This is a smart tv! It has an excellent picture, features plus the built in Fire TV makes this an outstanding value! Highly Recommended!

Product Title: All-New Toshiba 50LF621U21 50-inch Smart 4K UHD with Dolby Vision - Fire TV Edition, Released 2020
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2020
Review Description: Love this TV. Especially with 1 remote to control TV and Amazon Fire...

Product Title: All-New Toshiba 50LF621U21 50-inch Smart 4K UHD with Dolby Vision - Fire TV Edition, Released 2020
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2020
Review Title: Works PERFECT for my unusual situation.
Review Description: Just moved into our beautiful $12 Million firehouse. We have individual bedrooms where we are allowed to mount a television. This unit fit perfectly and, from where I lay on my bed, it is about 10' to the screen. I almost bought a sound bar to accompany it, but I read the reviews and everyone commented on how well the sound worked on the unit. In my small area, it will blast you out. The sound quality is fine for what I need, especially since out of volume levels from 1-100 I usually have it at about 10-15 depending on the source of programming. It was really easy to set up with onscreen prompts. I subscribe to Fubo and it wasn't pre-loaded, so I just logged into Fubo on the television internet and downloaded it, put my password in and I was off to the races.  I've only had it less than a week, so I have no idea how durable it will be, but, it seems to be fine.

Product Title: All-New Toshiba 50LF621U21 50-inch Smart 4K UHD with Dolby Vision - Fire TV Edition, Released 2020
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2020
Review Title: Arrived damaged as other have said
Review Description: Other reviews said that they received a damaged unit as well but I went ahead and ordered one anyways. I took it directly out of the hands of the UPS driver, unboxed it per the instructions, and plugged it in. It briefly displayed a damaged screen where I was still able to see the setup menu. Shortly after the screen went to what you see in the image. I would have to assume this is a product defect and not the result of shipping due to the numerous other reviews reporting the same thing.

Product Title: All-New Toshiba 50LF621U21 50-inch Smart 4K UHD with Dolby Vision - Fire TV Edition, Released 2020
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2020
Review Description: I read the reviews on this tv and decided to order it. I’ve had a Toshiba tv in the past and loved the picture quality. Received my tv a day early (Amazon driver even rang our doorbell to let us know it was on our porch) and it was all intact with no damage. All parts (remote, feet, cord, instructions) were easy to find in the box. Set up was easy! Sound quality is great, switch to “music” setting in sound settings for improved sound. The remote makes things easier to navigate the tv and Fire app. Voice remote is a bonus! Can’t go wrong for the price - a 50” tv with all the integrated goodies. I got the 4 yr warrant for $30 just in case. I’m super happy with this purchase. Frankly, I don’t understand when people give negative reviews for things like being hard of hearing and blame the tv? Or couldn’t find the remote right away in the packaging ? Seriously? Again, real happy with this tv and the price with fast delivery. Thanks Amazon!

Product Title: All-New Toshiba 50LF621U21 50-inch Smart 4K UHD with Dolby Vision - Fire TV Edition, Released 2020

Review Title: Service through Best Buy and Toshiba" SUCKS"
Review Description: The worst  television I have ever purchased will never buy another Toshiba! Bought this from Best Buy on a daily deal on Amazon . I know why it was a daily deal, it's acrap telesion . Had it in my house for 2weekAnd it quit working, Toshiba no longer makes replacement part, 6  weeks later had to call them because no contact about it even after several calls to "Geek Sqaud" and 3rd party . waiting on phone to Best Buys  special forces department to find out what they are going to do. Its been an hour on hold already. Never again Best Buy! Never again Toshiba!

Product Title: All-New Toshiba 50LF621U21 50-inch Smart 4K UHD with Dolby Vision - Fire TV Edition, Released 2020
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2020
Review Title: DO NOT BUY!!! You have been warned.
Review Description: I read the reviews for this TV the complaints about the sound and loss of picture. Well I had this set for 1 hour in that time the sound went out. I had to go on google and YouTube to figure that out. Then once that was working again I was simply going through apps trying to set everything up and the picture went completely out. I uploaded a photo. If it was $5 I would say run DO NOT BUY!!!

Product Title: All-New Toshiba 50LF621U21 50-inch Smart 4K UHD with Dolby Vision - Fire TV Edition, Released 2020
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2020
Review Description: Set this up, turned it on with no problem and it had a great picture. After a few minutes the screen went black, but the sound was still on. We moved it and set it up in a different room and again it came on and stayed on for a few minutes and went black again. Tried a third time in a different room and the same thing happened. Now we have to go to the trouble and return it. What a waste of time and money and gas. We do NOT recommend this set.

Review Description: My best testimonial. I bought one. Then went back and bought five more. Great picture Great sound. Super value

Review Description: AWESOME!!!! Product Title: All-New Toshiba 50LF621U21 50-inch Smart 4K UHD with Dolby Vision - Fire TV Edition, Released 2020

Review Description: Came to me with screen shattered. And to return, I have to take this thing to UPS myself because pick up is not an option, and I have to print the shipping label too. What nonsense!!!

Product Title: All-New Toshiba 50LF621U21 50-inch Smart 4K UHD with Dolby Vision - Fire TV Edition, Released 2020
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2020
Review Title: Great value for those ready to upgrade to 4k.
Review Description: Just got this TV today (7-28-20) and overall I am very pleased. The picture and sound quality are really good. It functions like a 4k fire tv stick but you can connect it with an ethernet cable. The only things I don't like about it so far is that you can't set up a speaker pair with your echo speakers like you can with the 4k fire tv stick. The remote is also very limited. Although the quick app launch buttons (Prime Video, Netflix, Hulu, and HBO) can put you straight into those apps even when the TV is off, just by using those buttons instead of the power button. Adjusting the picture required me to go back to the home screen then use the settings button on the remote, which was a little annoying, but after I was done settings everything up wasn't a big deal. I picked up this 50 inch 4k TV for $300 so I still feel the overall value for the money was well worth it. -UPDATE- (8-20-20) I realized my issue with the picture settings was that I just wasn't pressing the settings button long enough. A quick tap will not bring up the settings, but if you hold the button down for a second it comes right up as it should. Another feature that I like is when you are on the home screen and you highlight an input (which you can name) it will show you a real-time picture/ video of what that input is currently displaying in the top right corner of the screen. 5 Stars all day!!! A great 4k 50 inch TV with Fire TV built in for $300. It's a no brainer!!!

Product Title: All-New Toshiba 50LF621U21 50-inch Smart 4K UHD with Dolby Vision - Fire TV Edition, Released 2020
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2020
Review Description: It's an OK TV and that's OK with me.I was not looking for something spectacular for $200. The TV met my expectations. Make sure you set your expectations right before buying this product or you'll end up here writing negative reviews.I want now to address some complaints that I read from other buyers.1. The TV is very light. I can easily carry it with one arm. The stand legs are fine too. Some people complain that the stand legs are thin and not sturdy. They are thin, but they are metallic and very sturdy.2. The picture is good enough. The blacks are not very deep, but I didn't get a TV to see black screens. People complain about not seeing 4K. I do get 4K and it looks fine. The source must be in 4K and your internet must be at least 15Mbs otherwise it switches to 1080p.3. The sound is fine too. To be honest I always have the TV on low volume. After all I didn't buy it as a stereo.4. The Fire TV software needs a little getting used to but that's true for everything.5. People complain about little space to store apps. That's true. Personally, I only use antenna and a few streaming apps (YouTube, Twitch, Prime Video). Plenty of space for that. If you want more apps at the same time then you need to use a USB stick.The only real problem I encountered was that the TV lost picture 2 times while watching antenna channels. Other people had this problem as well. Interestingly enough, I maintained picture on the streaming apps. The problem went away once I unplugged the TV. That makes me think that it's a software issue rather than a physical problem. I also reduced the back light density to 60% and since then I haven't had the problem again.That's my review. I hope it helps.

Product Title: All-New Toshiba 50LF621U21 50-inch Smart 4K UHD with Dolby Vision - Fire TV Edition, Released 2020
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2020
Review Description: The 43" Toshiba screen was great until it wasn't.  The backlight fails after about 20-30 minutes of use and the screen turns 100% black.  Turn off/on the TV and the screen comes back on for another 20-30 minutes of use.  The temporary fix until I can get BestBuy to do something is to turn the screen brightness down -- in my case 0% works.  Which of course makes it hard to see the screen content!
